A Psalm<S>4210</S> of David<S>1732</S>, when he fled<S>1272</S> from<S>6440</S> Absalom<S>53</S> his son<S>1121</S>. LORD<S>3068</S>, how are they increased<S>7231</S> that trouble<S>6862</S> me! many<S>7227</S> are they that rise up<S>6965</S> against me.
Many<S>7227</S> there be which say<S>559</S> of my soul<S>5315</S>, There is no help<S>3444</S> for him in God<S>430</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>.
But thou, O LORD<S>3068</S>, art a shield<S>4043</S> for me; my glory<S>3519</S>, and the lifter up<S>7311</S> of mine head<S>7218</S>. <sup>for: or, about</sup>
I cried<S>7121</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> with my voice<S>6963</S>, and he heard<S>6030</S> me out of his holy<S>6944</S> hill<S>2022</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>.
I laid me down<S>7901</S> and slept<S>3462</S>; I awaked<S>6974</S>; for the LORD<S>3068</S> sustained<S>5564</S> me.
I will not be afraid<S>3372</S> of ten thousands<S>7233</S> of people<S>5971</S>, that have set<S>7896</S> themselves against me round about<S>5439</S>.
Arise<S>6965</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>; save<S>3467</S> me, O my God<S>430</S>: for thou hast smitten<S>5221</S> all mine enemies<S>341</S> upon the cheek bone<S>3895</S>; thou hast broken<S>7665</S> the teeth<S>8127</S> of the ungodly<S>7563</S>.
Salvation<S>3444</S> belongeth unto the LORD<S>3068</S>: thy blessing<S>1293</S> is upon thy people<S>5971</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>.
